General.Name: New Energy Metals Corp
General.Description: New Energy Metals Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. It had an option agreement to acquire a 100% interest in 26 mineral claims located in the Omineca mining division of British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Darien Resource Development Corp. and changed its name to New Energy Metals Corp. in April 2018. New Energy Metals Corp. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 200 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1S4

2.Name: Dr. Thomas  Henriksen B.Sc.
